text: Santosh Vempala (born 18 October 1971) is a prominent computer scientist. He is a Distinguished Professor of Computer Science at the Georgia Institute of Technology. His main work has been in the area of Theoretical Computer Science.S. Vempala, ``The Random Projection Method", American Mathematical Society, 2004.R. Kannan and S. Vempala,``Spectral Algorithms, Now Publishers Inc., 2009. == References == == Other websites == * Santosh Vempala's home page Category:1971 births Category:Indian computer scientists Category:Academics from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Georgia Institute of Technology
title: Santosh Vempala
